Text: Plan Presentation Pages for Executive ReviewTracy Do I need to turn in anything to Corporate for the plan presentation due Oct
Out of Office AutoReply Plan Assessments as of for ERECI will be out of the office on maternity leave beginning October If you need assistance please contact Blake Walker x
Budget Review EEOS Cc Cindy The attendees from EEOS to the review with Stan on Friday Oct th from pm are Brian Stanley Keith Dodson Blake Walker and myself The meeting is to be held at EB Erin x

FW Plan Lay Presentation Run Through Cc Tracy Please add Blake Walker and Keith Marlow to your distribution of future correspondence regarding the plan presentation Also while Im on maternity leave Blake will be the EEOS contact Thanks Erin Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Thursday October AM To McCarty Danny Cordes Bill Stanley Brian FOWLER PEGGY Garrison John L Hughes James A Umanoff Adam Cc Anderson Michael Sommers Jeffrey E Peters Jerry Copeland Erin Dodson Keith Piro Jim Lindholm Tod A Armstrong Julie Stark Cindy Hayslett Rod Stark Cindy Subject Plan Lay Presentation Run Through Stan would like to have a run through of the presentation for the Lay reviews on November Please see the agenda attached below for your respective groups time We will be meeting in EB C If you need to call in the number is below If you can not attend please send a representative CALL IN PARTICIPANT CODE Toll Free Dial In Number If you are calling in please send your presentation to me ahead of time so I can make copies Please feel free to invite anyone else you want to attend If you have any questions I can be reached at Thanks Tracy

RE Quarter UpdateWe are turning into Corp today CE This is a variance of to what you have below NEPCO due to project profit adjustments on LS PowerKendall IL CogentrixJenks OK and ECoast PowerLinden NJ EEOS Puerto Rico Bonus accrual and misc other FYI We are currently looking at the NEPCO projects to see if they require further writedowns Are we reporting the Q through EGS and not Wholesale Please let me know Erin Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Thursday October AM To Sommers Jeffrey E Stevens Kirk Giles Valerie Lindholm Tod A Anderson Michael Meers Thomas Copeland Erin Dodson Keith Cc Hayslett Rod Subject Quarter Update Importance High Rod and I are meeting with Stan Monday afternoon October to talk about the th Quarter I have listed below the latest IBIT impact to Enron for the th Quarter that I have Please let me know if there are any changes and provide any variance explanations if necessary PGG EREC Azurix including Marlin Clean fuels EGAS EEOS Thanks Tracy
EEOS Q Forecast Cc Tracy Attached is the detail of the th quarter IBIT of with a variance to the last Q IBIT presented to Stan of We will be sending the CE to you shortly

FW Business Review UpdatesTracy Susan Saini is John Gillis assistant and she is out today You should hear from her on Monday Erin Original Message From Lehtinen Kristi Sent Friday October PM To Cc Copeland Erin Subject Business Review Updates Importance High Susan the following people have the business review down for October Is this correct If not please let them know immediately Stan Horton Rod Hayslett Tracy Geaccone Also can you please add them to the email distribution for the business review for updates and future meetings If you have any questions give me a calTHANKS Kristi Lehtinen Financial Analyst NEPCO North Creek Pkwy N Bothell WA Phone Fax
